gw.api.system

Class BCConfigParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.system.BCConfigParameters

  • public class BCConfigParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to fetch the values of configuration parameters defined in config.xml The list of parameters here is the list of all legal config parameters.

        public static final StringParameterKey ProRataCalculationRemainderTreatment
        How to distribute the remainder amount in pro-rata calculations. Choices: overweightFromFront, overweightFromBack, overweightFirst, overweightLast

      • CommissionRemainderTreatment

        public static final StringParameterKey CommissionRemainderTreatment
        How to distribute the remainder amount for commission in agency bill in pro-rata calculations. Choices: overweightFromFront, overweightFromBack, overweightFirst, overweightLast, writeoff

        Whether future invoices should be collapsed into a single invoice when a cancellation billing instruction is received

        At what time the invoice period due is cut off

      • DisableHashJoinForPolicySearch

        public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableHashJoinForPolicySearch
        BillingCenter works around hash join related query plan problems when executing certain policy searches on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the work around and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle.

      • DisableSortMergeJoinForPolicySearch

        public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableSortMergeJoinForPolicySearch
        BillingCenter works around sort merge join query plan problems when executing certain policy searches on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the workaround when DisableHashJoinForPolicySearch is set to true and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle

      • CreateRollupTxnsUponPolicyClosure

        public static final BooleanParameterKey CreateRollupTxnsUponPolicyClosure
        Whether to create rollup transactions at the time a policy is closed

      • IncludeClosedPoliciesInAccountAggregateBalances

        public static final BooleanParameterKey IncludeClosedPoliciesInAccountAggregateBalances
        Whether to include closed policies in the totals returned by an Account's balance methods

      • DisableIndexFastFullScanForAgencyCycleException

        public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableIndexFastFullScanForAgencyCycleException
        BillingCenter works around an index fast full scan query plan problem when executing agency cycle exception queries for the My Agency Items page on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the workaround when DisableHashJoinForPolicySearch is set to true and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle.

      • DisableHashJoinForAgencyCycleException

        public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableHashJoinForAgencyCycleException
        BillingCenter works around hash join related query plan problems when executing agency cycle exception queries for the My Agency Items page on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the work around and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle.

      • DisableSortMergeJoinForAgencyCycleException

        public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableSortMergeJoinForAgencyCycleException
        BillingCenter works around sort merge join query plan problems when executing agency cycle exception queries for the My Agency Items page on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the workaround when DisableHashJoinForPolicySearch is set to true and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle.

      • EquityDatingIncludeWriteoffs

        public static final BooleanParameterKey EquityDatingIncludeWriteoffs
        Whether equity dating calculations should consider policy writeoffs when calculating policy equity and paid through date

      • FullPayDiscountPolicyPeriodsPerWorkItem

        public static final IntegerParameterKey FullPayDiscountPolicyPeriodsPerWorkItem
        The number of policy period ids to store per work item for the Full Pay Discount work queue. The optimal number of ids per work item depends on the cost of the IPolicyPeriod.applyFullPayDiscount plugin method, the total number of policy periods to be processed and the number of worker threads used. Smaller numbers of policy periods per work item allow greater parallelism but can increase the costs of administering the queue (more queue items, more locking). Larger numbers of policy periods reduce work queue administration costs, but reduce parallelism.

      • PaymentRequestsPerWorkItem

        public static final IntegerParameterKey PaymentRequestsPerWorkItem
        The number of payment request ids to store per work item for the Payment Request work queue. The optimal number of ids per work item depends on the cost of processing one work item, the total number of payment requests to be processed and the number of worker threads used. Smaller numbers of payment requests per work item allow greater parallelism but can increase the costs of administering the queue (more queue items, more locking). Larger numbers of payment requests reduce work queue administration costs, but reduce parallelism. Typically, if there are a large number of cheap work items then putting multiple ids per work item will improve performance. The Payment Request work item cost is small in the out of box configuration. However, messaging costs may make it much higher at customer sites, so customers may need to reduce the value of this parameter.

      • FundsAllotmentAccountsPerWorkItem

        public static final IntegerParameterKey FundsAllotmentAccountsPerWorkItem
        The number of account ids to store per work item for the Funds Allotment work queue. The optimal number of ids per work item depends on the cost of the IFundsTracking.allotFunds plugin method, the total number of accounts to be processed and the number of worker threads used. Smaller numbers of accounts per work item allow greater parallelism but can increase the costs of administering the queue (more queue items, more locking). Larger numbers of accounts reduce work queue administration costs, but reduce parallelism.

      • EnableWorkQueueValidation

        public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableWorkQueueValidation
        The BillingCenter specific work queues turn off validation rules by default. This improves performance and should not affect functionality as neither the core product nor most customers use validation rules. This parameter can be used to enable validation for these work queues, at some performance cost (even if there are no validation rules there is some per commit overhead associated with validation). Guidewire recommends leaving this parameter false unless validation is needed for backwards compatibility. This parameter only affects validation for BC specific work queues and does not affect generic work queues such as Activity Escalation, User/Group Exception and Contact Auto Sync, which continue to run the validation rules (if any) on every commit.

      • MaxTransactionsInConsistencyCheck

        public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxTransactionsInConsistencyCheck
        On very large databases we can split some of the consistency checks that operate on transactions/line items into multiple queries, each covering a specific id subrange, to limit the amount of temporary space used by the queries. This parameter specifies the maximum number of transactions in a subrange. If it is zero (the default) then we do not split the consistency checks.

      • MaxTAccountsInConsistencyCheck

        public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxTAccountsInConsistencyCheck
        On very large databases we can split some of the consistency checks that operate on taccounts into multiple queries, each covering a specific id subrange, to limit the amount of temporary space used by the queries. This parameter specifies the maximum number of taccounts in a subrange. If it is zero (the default) then we do not split the consistency checks.

      • EnableChargeProRataTxCreation

        public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableChargeProRataTxCreation
        This parameter enables splitting of charges into earning installments. Once this parameter has been set to false: 1) it should never be set back to true and 2) the ChargeProRataTxnWorkQueue should be disabled as well.

      • MaxSearchResults

        public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxSearchResults
        Limits the number of results on the search pages; if a search would return more results than this number the user will see a message asking them to refine their search. This can substantially reduce the load on the database for searches that would otherwise return many pages of results. A zero or negative value for this parameter means no limit (not recommended). Alternatively the limit for a particular page can be configured by editing the PCF for that page.

      • AllocateInvoiceNumberOnInit

        public static final BooleanParameterKey AllocateInvoiceNumberOnInit
        Configure whether an Invoice allocates its InvoiceNumber during instantiation initialization or later during commit. Setting this to true has negative consequences preview policy functionality and throughput, and is not recommended. Deprecated 8.0.3

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultRoundingMode

        public static java.math.RoundingMode getDefaultRoundingMode()
        Returns:
        The default RoundingMode of the application.

      • getAllKeys

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ParameterKey> getAllKeys()
        Returns:
        a map of all parameters keys defined in the product. Platform config keys should be fetched using PLConfigParameters.getAllKeys()
